ai-anya-e1001n7:3_0: disgracing their family, they don’t fail to give their family.
ai-anya-e1001n7:5_0: Seeing five reasons, they speak well.
ai-anya-e1001n7:6_0: Since we looked after them, they’ll do their duty for us.
ai-anya-e1001n7:8_0: The family traditions will take care of the family.
ai-anya-e1001n7:11_0: His father has many years of age;
ai-anya-e1001n7:12_0: and Mahānāma didn’t get to provide for his father.
ai-anya-e1001n7:14_0: Or a child would matted for their father, not formidable,
